description: Try our easy to follow Salmon, Cream Cheese & Dill Sandwich recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sandwich,Pescatarian,High protein,Tree nut free,Egg free,Quick & easy lunch,Low sugar,Spinach,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Salmon, Cream Cheese & Dill Sandwich Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Lebanese cucumber, cut into long ribbons
105g salmon, canned in water, drained & flaked

recipeInstructions.text: Place cream cheese, dill and lemon zest in a small bowl. Season with freshly ground black pepper and mix until well combined.
Place two slices of bread on a board. Spread cream cheese mixture evenly over bread.
Top with spinach, cucumber and salmon. Place remaining bread on top. Cut in half to serve. TIPS: Try using any fresh herbs you have in place of the dill and the lemon zest with lime or orange zest.
Use a vegetable peeler to cut cucumber into ribbons.
